Sentencas: Materials with the scheelite structure exhibit mixed ionic and electronic conductivity, and are of interest as oxidation catalysts.
Titulo: TRANSPORT-PROPERTIES OF MATERIALS WITH THE SCHEELITE STRUCTURE

Sentencas: Scheelite materials are also possible candidates for use as electrolytes or cathode materials in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: TRANSPORT-PROPERTIES OF MATERIALS WITH THE SCHEELITE STRUCTURE

Sentencas: Our work on the scheelite system, based on BiVO4, shows that both ionic and electronic components of the conductivity can be modified by doping this material.
Titulo: TRANSPORT-PROPERTIES OF MATERIALS WITH THE SCHEELITE STRUCTURE

Sentencas: Both A and B site doping have been investigated.
Titulo: TRANSPORT-PROPERTIES OF MATERIALS WITH THE SCHEELITE STRUCTURE

Sentencas: The A cation was replaced by Ca, Ce and Zr, and the B site by Mo.
Titulo: TRANSPORT-PROPERTIES OF MATERIALS WITH THE SCHEELITE STRUCTURE
